sentences.sentence: The high incidence of diarrhea was encountered following truncal vagotomy.
sentences.translation: 迷走神经干切断术后的腹泻发生率高。

sentences.sentence: The bradycardiac effect was significantly attenuated by bilateral vagotomy (P<0.01).
sentences.translation: 双侧迷走神经切断后，降心率作用减弱（P<0.01）。

sentences.sentence: All types of vagotomy cause an increase of basal and postprandial serum gastrin levels.
sentences.translation: 所有类型的迷走神经切断术，均产生空腹和餐后血清促胃液素水平的升高。
